Activity: Log in to the OA system, check emails. Review project timelines and identify any delays or bottlenecks.
Meet with @cio-1 and @coo-1 to discuss mid-project review outcomes and adjust project goals accordingly.
Draft updated project goals and timelines based on the meeting outcomes.
Send the draft to @cio-1 and @coo-1 for review and feedback.
Incorporate feedback from @cio-1 and @coo-1 into the project goals and timelines.
Schedule stakeholder meetings for updates presentation. Coordinate with @ir-1 and @mkt-1 for scheduling.
Prepare presentation materials for stakeholder meetings, including progress reports and updated goals.
Review presentation materials with @cio-1 and @coo-1 for final approval.
